column1: Title: Number of Voters as a Share of the Voter Population, by Gender | The Henry J. Kaiser Family Foundation

column5: Individuals who Voted as a Share of the Voter Population__Female
column6: Individuals who Voted as a Share of the Voter Population__Male
column7: Individuals who Voted as a Share of the Voter Population__Total

column1: *Number of Individuals who Voted* are reported in thousands and apply to the respective election. Data may not sum to total due to rounding.

*Voter Population* includes US citizens who are of voting age (18 years of age or older). This population may include individuals who are ineligible to vote for reasons other than lack of citizenship or who are under 18 years of age.
*Individuals who Voted as a Share of the Voter Population* represent voting rates by gender, rather than a distribution of voters by gender.
U.S. Census Bureau, Current Population Survey, November 2014, 2016, and 2018; [Voting and Registration Tables](https://www.census.gov/topics/public-sector/voting/data/tables.html).
